execution_plan.description: Retrieve distinct product names from the goods catalog that are cakes.
execution_plan.query: SELECT DISTINCT food AS cake_type FROM goods WHERE food IS NOT NULL AND food ILIKE '%cake%';

execution_plan.description: Retrieve distinct item names from the items table that are cakes.
execution_plan.query: SELECT DISTINCT Item AS cake_type FROM items WHERE Item IS NOT NULL AND LOWER(Item) LIKE '%cake%';
